name: Dungeon Helpers
description:
Solo Project. If you've ever played blockudoku or 10x10, the game is a twist on the genre with the addition of helpers who give small unique advantages.

How to play:

Click and drag the blocks to form

• Rows

• Columns

• 3 by 3 Squares

There are 6 helpers to choose from:

Priest, Rogue, Warrior, Archer, Mage and Demo
